messages.message: Hello, I have been Delivered a wrong item, it was meant to be a rice cooker but got delivered an air fryer instead
Sorry to hear that, we will definitley they it replaced.
Thank you, can i get a refund instead
Definitely, we would like you to fill up a form sent to your email inorder to send us back the item and we will refund you immediately
